text: Mr. Box Office is an American syndicated sitcom that premiered on September 22, 2012. The series centers on Marcus Jackson (Bill Bellamy), a well-known movie actor who ends up in legal trouble due to a physical altercation with a paparazzo, leading to his sentence to teach a class of inner-city high school students in Los Angeles' infamous South Central neighborhood. The following is a list of episodes of the program, shown in order of its broadcast airdate. == Episodes == ===Season 1 (2012–13)=== ===Season 2 (2013–15)=== == References == ;General references * * * Category:Lists of television series episodes Category:English-language television programs
title: Mr. Box Office
